Subjects enrol study time presentation colposcopy EAMC Family Medicine Clinic . Subjects screen inclusion exclusion criterion . Those find eligible consented enrollment one study investigator . Colposcopy record also search patient see colposcopy clinic availability Gardasil beginning study . Any patient meet enrollment criterion contact phone invite participate study . These patient follow exact way patient enrol upon present first time colposcopy clinic . Patients give first vaccination time colposcopy appointment unless already begin vaccine series . Phone email use remind patient due second third vaccination . Any study subject receive 2nd 3rd vaccine consider `` partially vaccinate '' . They remove protocol , however , intention-to-treat analysis plan . Study subject follow prospectively 15 month . 15 month choose patient may late get one-year follow ups . AHLTA record colposcopy clinic convenience file review patient periodically . Patients meet criterion return routine annual Pap smear , base ASCCP guideline , next 11 15 month consider `` reversion '' . Those patient ASCUS , + HPV , LGSIL , HGSIL Pap smear 11 15 month past original Pap smear consider `` persistent '' . Historical control subject also group `` reversion '' `` persistent '' use criterion .
